description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+23 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage, and Jalanvaloss slides the target 2 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force

Standard

Reach 2

+23 vs AC; 2d8+7 damage plus 1d8 force damage.

At-Will

Standard

Jalanvaloss makes two arcane claw attacks

At-Will ✦ Force, Teleportation

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 1

Trigger: When an enemy moves into an adjacent square, at-will

+22 vs Fortitude; 2d8+7 damage, and the target is knocked prone. Effect: Jalanvaloss teleports 4 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Force

Standard

Close blast 5

+21 vs Fortitude; 4d6+8 force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Jalanvaloss uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +22 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Jalanvaloss's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Force

Standard

Area burst 1 within 20

+22 vs Reflex; 2d6+5 force damage.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic, Zone

Standard

Jalanvaloss makes three area burst attacks, and the bursts can't overlap: area burst 1 within 20; +22 vs Fortitude; 2d6+5 necrotic damage. The burst becomes a zone of draining darkness until the end of Jalanvaloss's next turn. Any creature except Jalanvaloss that starts its turn within the zone takes 5 necrotic damage. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures, and any creature entirely within the zone is blinded until it leaves the zone. Jalanvaloss is immune to the effects of the zone. Sustain Minor: The effect persists.

At-Will ✦ Polymorph

Minor

Jalanvaloss alters her form to appear as a unique human (see "Change Shape," MM2 216).

Encounter ✦ Illusion, Teleportation

Minor

Jalanvaloss becomes invisible and teleports 4 squares. In the space she left, an illusory double appears and moves 8 squares. The double vanishes and Jalanvaloss becomes visible at the end of Jalanvaloss's next turn.

system.biography:
HP 692; Bloodied 346 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 20 force 		Init +13 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 31Fort 29Ref 27Will 31 ; see also illusory double
Speed 8, fly 10, overland flight 12 see also dimension step
Ability ScoresStr 24 (+16)
Con 21 (+14)		Dex 18 (+13)
Int 20 (+14)		Wis 20 (+14)
Cha 26 (+17)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +19, Bluff +22, Diplomacy +22, History +19, Insight +19, Streetwise +22Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 24 | Insight 29

Equipment fine clothing , ritual book , wand implement .

Jalanvaloss becomes invisible and teleports 4 squares. In the space she left, an illusory double appears and moves 8 squares. The double vanishes and Jalanvaloss becomes visible at the end of Jalanvaloss’s next turn.

Move
